text.section:
The officially certified statement shall:
Be executed by the official of that place who has custody of the pertinent record; and
Include the action taken and the date the action was taken.

section.section: A representative of the successor corporation shall file with the Department an affidavit indicating whether the corporation, partnership, limited partnership, or limited liability company merging out of existence or consolidating owns an interest in land in Maryland.
The Department may not process a filing under this section until the information required by this subsection and § 3-117 of this article is provided.
